summary: Kharze is part 4 of my RaceMenu Preset series, aiming to cover both genders of all 10 races. Kharze has been hand-crafted in Racemenu, and is actually one of my head-canon characters. There will be more on that down the road though
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Tahoma][color=#ff7700][size=5]Overview
[/size][/color][/font][/b]This is a simple mod, and as the name implies, it's just a RaceMenu preset of a Male Khajiit named Kharze. Kharze is actually a well developed character in my personal head-canon, as well as his Bosmeri wife (who will be the female Bosmer preset).

This is where I get to tease what this whole RaceMenu Preset series has been about. The most popular of the presets (once all have been made) will be made into standalone followers, Kharze will be one regardless of popularity. But before I get ahead of myself, enjoy the presets as I release them to the nexus.

Kharze is Part 4 of my Racemenu presets. You can find the other ones here on [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/41281005/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My Profile[/url]Â 

[b][font=Tahoma][color=#ff7700][size=5]Requirements
[/size][/color][/font][/b]I try to keep my presets' requirements down to a minimum, because who wants to download a bunch of stuff that requires a bunch of other stuff to download?[list]
[*][size=2][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url][/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url] [/size]
[/list][b][font=Tahoma][color=#ff7700][size=5]Installation
[/size][/color][/font][/b]Manual Installation made simple. Simply unzip into your Skyrim directory (not the data folder) and you're good to go.

[b][font=Tahoma][color=#ff7700][size=5]Updates
[/size][/color][/font][/b]This mod likely won't need updating, but in the event it does, I'll add to this section
[list]
[*][size=2]v1.0 - Mod release[/size]
[/list]
[b][font=Tahoma][color=#ff7700][size=5]Extras
[/size][/color][/font][/b]Mods used in screenshots[list]
[*][size=2]RaceMenu[/size]
[*][size=2]Masculine Khajiit Textures[/size]
[/list]
author: UmbraManum
